title: Second Doctor (1)
description: The Second Doctor is an incarnation of the Doctor, the main character of the BBC science fiction television series Doctor Who. He was portrayed by actor Patrick Troughton. The Second Doctor has been nicknamed the *Cosmic Hobo*, as the impish Second Doctor appeared to be far more scruffy and childlike than his first incarnation. Though outwardly warm, bumbling, and clownish, the Second Doctor also had a darker, more cunning aspect to his personality â€” one which he usually kept hidden in order to carry out his plans.
